trans-unit.source: Indicates that the implementing message sink will be provided by dynamically registered properties.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o sink de mensagem implementar será fornecido pelo propriedades dinamicamente registadas.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic message sinks are provided with notifications of call start and call finish with flags indicating whether the call is currently on the client side or server side (this is useful for the context level sinks).
trans-unit.target: Mensagem dinâmica sinks são fornecidos com as notificações de chamada de início e de chamada concluir com os sinalizadores que indica se a chamada está atualmente no lado do cliente ou do lado do servidor (isto é útil para os contexto nível sinks).

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a call is returning.
trans-unit.target: Indica que uma chamada está a devolver.

trans-unit.source: The Boolean parameters indicate whether the sink is located on the client side or the server side and whether the call is using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros booleanos indicam se o sink encontra-se no lado do cliente ou do lado do servidor e se está a utilizar a chamada de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A>método.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is invoked on the client side and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is invoked on the server side.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o método é invocado no lado do cliente e <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se é invocado no lado do servidor.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is an asynchronic call and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is a synchronic call.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se se tratar de uma chamada asynchronic e <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se se tratar de uma chamada synchronic.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a call is starting.
trans-unit.target: Indica que uma chamada está a iniciar.

trans-unit.source: The Boolean parameters indicate whether the sink is located on the client side or the server side and whether the call is using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros booleanos indicam se o sink encontra-se no lado do cliente ou do lado do servidor e se está a utilizar a chamada de <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A>método.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is invoked on the client side and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the method is on the server side.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o método é invocado no lado do cliente e <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o método está no lado do servidor.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is an asynchronic call and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is a synchronic call.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se se tratar de uma chamada asynchronic e <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se se tratar de uma chamada synchronic.
